name: Dream Girlfriend: Twitch Thot 18+ 💜
description:
Dream Girlfriend: Twitch Thot 18+ is an adult-only visual novel with match-3 minigames.

You play as a most ordinary guy who spends most of his life watching anime and live streams. But one day everything changes - he is given a chance to meet his idol, Alice, a stunning girl streamer, and play a strip game with her, right in front of thousands of viewers!

Join the stream to find what Alice is hiding behind her "perfect girl" facade and... her clothes!

KEY FEATURES

  • Captivating story
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Character animation
  • In-game gallery
  • Achievements (optional)
  • Free 5K resolution wallpaper pack
